purpose: Outline goals and strategies for value creation and equity story development.
title: What our work together will achieve

bullets.text: Consistent value creation plan aligning business, financial and investor policies
Review of existing business plans, their quality and how each business unit will contribute to future value creation
In-depth analysis of alternative options for key themes, and understanding of the TSR implications (e.g. Capex envelope for IT, Opex target for EBU¹, etc.)
Deep dive on roll out scenarios for fiber and associated financials
Integrated value creation plan, with supporting figures, high level levers to pull, and KPIs
Empirical view on drivers of relative valuation based on BCG's SmartMultiple™ regression to identify key themes to focus on
Advise the storyline and develop materials for a high-impact equity story
Articulated, compelling strategy addressing key proof points for Client's investment thesis
Credible plans and traceable target KPIs (aimed at optimizing Client's TSR performance)
"Hands on" input to craft the key themes for investor day and Client presentation materials (also serving as basis for future investor communications)

reasoning_strategy: Emphasizing detailed analysis and strategic planning
